resources.string:
This application is a native PeepETH client for Android. It was born at the 1st ETHBerlin hackathon 2018.

If you do not yet have a PeepETH account ligi a mail - he has 5 direct invites per day so it goes really fast.

Our great Icon was designed by ozko. Code is done by Dirk. But you can also contribute. The code is GPLv3 and you can find it here.

Big shout out to Bevan (the father of the PeepETH project) - skywinder + Team (they did an iOS client that helped understanding the protocol) and the whole ETHBerlin team - the spirit there was just plain awesome.
